name: Python Coding Challenge Attendee
description: The LSE Python Coding Challenge focussed on financial services, utilising a cutting-edge virtual exchange developed by our employer sponsor, Optiver. Participants worked in interdisciplinary teams to develop trading algorithms in Python, testing and then optimising the algorithm's performance to achieve the best possible trading outcome. They then presented their processes and learning to a panel of judges from LSE Careers, LSE Digital Skills Lab, and employer-sponsor Optiver.

alignment.targetDescription: Institute of Coding recognition of attendance

criteria.narrative:
Participants must have completed the following courses successfully on the Dataquest.io learning platform:
1. Python for Data Science: Fundamentals
2. Pandas and NumPy Fundamentals
